description:
*** EARLY ADOPTERS ONLY, PLEASE, this is a 1.0 version ***
Finally, the beginnings of a Scorched Earth clone for WebOS!  You know, good ol' fashion tanks trying to get the right angle and power to shoot various weapons at each other without the wind blowing the shot off-target.
*** Users are saying: 
* "Easy to pick up, hard to put down. "
* "This whole game is awsome this the best game I have played on my palm pixi yet thankyou!"
* "I have been waiting for a good tank game for a year now and you blew away any idea of how well this could be done. "
* "Very addicting"
* "Brings back memories. "
* "Good addictive fun "
*** Features in this version (1.0.5): 
* designed for the touch screen, with drag aiming & power
* 4 weapons with increasing cost and increasing power
* auto-generated extreme hills and valleys
* earth destruction as weapons explode
* falling tanks as earth beneath is destroyed
* semi-intelligent computer players: their aim gets better with each shot, they take revenge when hit repeatedly by one player, they gang up when one player is too accurate with their shots
* smart scoring: bonus for direct hits, kills, battle wins, 
* closer hits earn more coins
* local device high-scores
* online world war team tracking by army or device type
* local multi-player up to 4 human players (pass the device to take turns)
* ok graphics (except the funny-looking cloud ;^) 
*** This version _does_ _not_ have: 
* sound
* online multi-player
* lots of cool weapons
* shields, armor, repellants, etc.
* tanks that can move
* a better looking cloud graphic
*** Please don't buy now if you can't live without the features this version doesn't have.  While bug fixes and many updates will be free, some future weapons packs and other upgrades will be sold separately.  If you enjoy this version and would like us to keep adding new features, please give us good ratings so we know we should keep developing this game rather than work on a different game.
